706635f-a.title: Brooklyn: Schermerhorn Street - Boerum Place
706635f-a.text:
119-129 Schermerhorn Street, north side, between Boerum Place and
Smith Street.
June 1, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
706635f-a.folder: Schermerhorn Street & Boerum Place, Brooklyn, NY

706634f-a.title: Brooklyn: Schermerhorn Street - Boerum Place
706634f-a.text:
110-118 Schermerhorn Street, south side, between Boerum Place and Smith
Street, showing the Friend's (Hicksite) Church and School.
April 7, 1932.
P. L. Sperr.
706634f-a.folder: Schermerhorn Street & Boerum Place, Brooklyn, NY

706636f-a.title: Brooklyn: Schermerhorn Street - Boerum Place
706636f-a.text:
121-135 Schermerhorn Street, north side, east from Boerum Place to
Smith Street, across site for Central Courts Building.
October 5, 1929.
P. L. Sperr.
706636f-a.folder: Schermerhorn Street & Boerum Place, Brooklyn, NY
